mapper.select: select emp_ID, emp_Name, Email, Phone, Dept_Code, job_code, sal_level, bonus, manager_id, hire_date, ent_date, ent_yn from employee order by emp_Id
select emp_ID, emp_Name, Email, Phone, Dept_Code, job_code, sal_level, bonus, manager_id, hire_date, ent_date, ent_yn from employee where emp_Id = #{ code }
select emp_ID, emp_Name, Email, Phone, Dept_Code, job_code, sal_level, bonus, manager_id, hire_date, ent_date, ent_yn from employee where emp_Name = #{ empName }
mapper.insert: insert into employee( (emp_Id, emp_Name, emp_No, Email ,Phone, Dept_Code,job_Code ,sal_Level,salary,bonus,manager_Id,hire_date, ent_date, ent_yn )values ( #{emp_id}, #{emp_name}, #{emp_no}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{dept_Code}, #{job_Code}, #{sal_Level}, #{salary}, #{bonus}, #{manager_Id}, #{hire_date}, #{ent_date}, #{ent_yn} )
